00009   Sass_Value* Number::construct(const std::vector<v8::Local<v8::Value>> raw_val, Sass_Value **out) {
00010     double value = 0;
00011     char const* unit = "";
00012 
00013     if (raw_val.size() >= 1) {
00014       if (!raw_val[0]->IsNumber()) {
00015         return fail("First argument should be a number.", out);
00016       }
00017 
00018       value = Nan::To<double>(raw_val[0]).FromJust();
00019 
00020       if (raw_val.size() >= 2) {
00021         if (!raw_val[1]->IsString()) {
00022           return fail("Second argument should be a string.", out);
00023         }
00024 
00025         unit = create_string(raw_val[1]);
00026       }
00027     }
00028 
00029     return *out = sass_make_number(value, unit);
00030   }

00034     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "getUnit", GetUnit);
00035     Nan::SetPrototypeMethod(proto, "setValue", SetValue);

00047   NAN_METHOD(Number::SetValue) {
00048 
00049     if (info.Length() != 1) {
00050       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected just one argument").ToLocalChecked());
00051     }
00052 
00053     if (!info[0]->IsNumber()) {
00054       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied value should be a number").ToLocalChecked());
00055     }
00056 
00057     sass_number_set_value(unwrap(info.This())->value, Nan::To<double>(info[0]).FromJust());
00058   }
00059 
00060   NAN_METHOD(Number::SetUnit) {
00061     if (info.Length() != 1) {
00062       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Expected just one argument").ToLocalChecked());
00063     }
00064 
00065     if (!info[0]->IsString()) {
00066       return Nan::ThrowTypeError(Nan::New("Supplied value should be a string").ToLocalChecked());
00067     }
00068 
00069     sass_number_set_unit(unwrap(info.This())->value, create_string(info[0]));
